title: Ticket #7675: condor_q -analyze should summarize sets
description:
A quick proposal/request by example. 

# With no arguments, defaults to "all".
$ condor_q -report [<set>|<cluster>|<workflow>]
Of 37 jobs analyzed, 22 are running, 4 are waiting for a slot, and 11 match no
slot in the local pool, which may mean they won't ever run.  For details, run:

condor_q -analyze 47.0-5 48.0-5
$ condor_q -analyze 47.0-5 48.0-5
The local pool will schedule jobs 47.0-5 and 48.0-5 in the same way.  Presenting one analysis for all of them.
